Novabus GM Classics | ridership = 1,403,700 (2011)http://www.apta.com/resources/statistics/Documents/Ridership/2011_q1_ridership_APTA.pdf | annual ridership = 399,303,100 (2010)http://www.apta.com/resources/statistics/Documents/Ridership/2010_q4_ridership_APTA.pdf | fuel_type = [[Diesel fuel]] | operator = [[SociÃ©tÃ© de transport de MontrÃ©al]] (STM) | ceo = | leader_type = | leader = | website = http://www.stm.info/english/bus/a-index.htm }} '''Montreal bus routes''' operated by the [[SociÃ©tÃ© de transport de MontrÃ©al]] (STM; Montreal Transit Corporation (MTC)), consists of 186 daytime and 23 nighttime service routes that provide a vast number of routes for the city of Montreal proper. STM bus routes serve an average of 1,403,700 daily passengers on an average weekday in 2011. A route is referred to by its route number and name (for example, 67 Saint-Michel). The name of the route is usually named after the road or community which it primarily serves; a Express route is denoted by a number 4 before the original number (for example, 467 Express Saint-Michel). A Express route travels on the same street and direction as the original route but would has fewer stops then the original route. ==Routes== The following is a complete list of all the Daytime Regular, Night Routes, Express Routes, and Senior Shuttles STM bus routes. {| class=wikitable style="font-size: 95%;" | !colspan=2|Legend |- !style="background:white;"| |[[File:AutobusmontrÃ©al.svg|20px]] Standard route |- !style="background:green;"| |[[File:STM Metrobus Express.svg|20px]] Express routes (400 series) |- !style="background:black;"| |[[File:S-nuit.gif|20px]] Night routes (300 series) |- !style="background:lightblue;"| |10 Minutes Max bus route |- !style="background:aqua;"| |Weekday service and Rush Hour routes |- !style="background:purple;"| |Seasonal / School routes |- !style="background:khaki;"| |Senior Shuttle |- ![[Image:Handicap.svg|12px]] |All routes are [[wheelchair]] [[accessibility|accessible]] |- ![[Image:Handicap.svg|12px]] [[Image:Arrow south.svg|6px]][[Image:Arrow north.svg|6px]] |[[Wheelchair]] [[accessibility|accessible]] [[wheelchair lift]] (Senior Shuttles only) |- ![[Image:USDOT highway sign bicycle symbol - black.svg|22px]] |[[Bicycle carrier|bicycle rack]] equipped buses (140 and 180) |} {| border="2" cellpadding="4" cellspacing="0" style="margin: 1em 1em 1em 0;
